Posts.Content: Feb 26, 2011 08:00PM freckles8 wrote: Jo1955 thanks for replying. I am calling first thing Monday morning but my pcp is away for a month so I will probably get someone else again. I called right after Mammogram & ultrasound and they told me to wait until she gets back and I should get letter soon explaining the results. Letter was general form letter with return in 3 mos in bold along with probably benign. Nothing in detail at all lime others have received.
Posts.Title: Extra Tissue? confused freckles8 freckles8

Posts.Content: freckles8 wrote: Felt a lump in rt breast, odd rash and nipple discharge all right breast only.  Had mammogram and ultrasound done 2 wks ago.  Ultrasound saw lump and said it is palpable & most likely subcutaneous cyst but they did see extra tissue in that breast compared to the left on on mammogram.  Since this is 1st one and not sure what the issue is I was to return in 6 months for another mammogram but just received letter saying abnormal findings come back in 3 months.  They didn't say it was a mass, lump or that my breast was dense just that the right had some extra tissue and being nervous and in shock I didn't really know what to ask but now want to call my pcp to understand the results. Any thoughts on what this could mean? Thanks. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Extra Tissue? confused freckles8 freckles8
